overview: Short film about a man (Alex) who goes home after work to meet his daughter again after 25 years. He left her when she was 5 years old. This will be the reunion with his daughter he has been waiting a long time for. But on his way home he hears a scream and finds his colleague unconscious on the floor. He dials the police, and when he checks the security cameras to see what has happened, she is suddenly gone. Everything happens while the lights go out for just a second. He goes back to the place where his colleague was just a minute ago, only her walkie-talkie remains. At that moment the police arrive, questioning him. The story sounds very weird to the officer and thinks it's a false alarm. When the officer leaves, the lights go out again. Alex is strangled. Then we see the woman who has strangled Alex, it's his daughter.
title: Reunion
